title: Fortuna, U.S. Virgin Islands
content:
Fortuna is a settlement on the island of Saint Thomas in the United States Virgin Islands. It is located in the far west of the island.

There are visible estate ruins in Fortuna.[1]

18°21′11″N 65°00′20″W﻿ / ﻿18.353011°N 65.005426°W﻿ / 18.353011; -65.005426
